front.title: IEEE Standard for a Metric Equipment Practice for Microcomputers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Dimension requirements are presented for subracks, plug-in units, printed boards, and backplanes to be used in conjunction with IEEE Std 1301-1991 and with a 2.5 mm connector as defined in IEC 48B (Central Office) 245. The general arrangement, dimensions, and environmental requirements are covered. This standard may be used with other IEEE Std 1301.x connector implementations in the subrack.<>
